seeds.name: Pink carrot
seeds.notes: Dark and difficult times lie ahead. Soon we must all face the choice between what is right and what is easy.

seeds.name: Chives
seeds.notes: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times if only one remembers to turn on the light.

seeds.name: Turnips
seeds.notes: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.

journalEntries.description: Do. Or do not. There is no try.
Clear your mind must be, if you are to find the villains behind this plot.
Do not assume anything Obi-Wan. Clear your mind must be if you are to discover the real villains behind this plot.
